name: ebook-landing-page
description: Landing page para download de e-book sobre tendências da indústria em SC

scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:static && npm run deploy:ebook && npm run invalidate-cache
scripts.invalidate-cache: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudfront list-distributions --query "DistributionList.Items[?Aliases.Items[0]=='$npm_config_domain'].Id" --output text) --paths "/*"
